page.title: 11A GIRL IN CROSSGATES
page.content: I am called{Claire Ann McKenna}and I am eight years old. I have a sister called Kate Elizabeth, and she is six. My Mum and Dad are both teachers and we live in Leeds. My{hobbies}are going to Brownies, playing the recorder and piano, swimming and roller skating. I enjoy reading mystery and adventure stories such as Nancy Drew or Secret Seven and Famous Five books. My {favourite subjects in school}are Art, Geography and History.I like these subjects as I find them fascinating. I enjoy travelling around the country during the school holidays to interesting places such as the Lake District and London. My{ambitions}are to be a musician or a clothes designer. I would also like to travel the world and be a happy person.
